Message:
It’s feared to be fatal,
as its victims have as
little as six months left,

By this time next year,
I’ll already be...

What kind of twisted joke is this?
This isn’t the place for me to stop.
I’m not about to let some disease...!

But, with my body not
moving as I wanted it to,
I knew it was withering away
with each passing day.

Why did this happen to me...?
Just when my legend was
getting started! Why...?!

If you have the time to weep,
then get stronger!
There’s no enemy
a sword can’t cut down!

I would say those words to
myself whenever I felt weak,
pushing myself forward
till this day. But...

No matter how much
stronger I’ve gotten,
I just can’t cut
this disease down!!
